snippet.title: [4K] Latest Phantasy Star Online 2: New Genesis Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The latest entry in the PSO2 series, PSO2: NGS was announced at Microsoft’s Online Conference, the Xbox Games Showcase, on Thursday, July 23, 2020. 

Celebrating PSO’s 20th anniversary, PSO2: NGS is the latest entry in the series, updating PSO2’s game system and graphics engine. We’re planning to release this update on a global scale, including Japan and North America.

First check out this 4K teaser trailer, then stay tuned for more information!

★ PSO2 Social
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PSO2Official
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/play_pso2
Twitter: https://twitter.com/play_pso2
